content: @ 2026 quantum crochet all rights reserved tips for perfectly straight color changes in the round i recommend following this tutorial take the time to read through the pattern carefully to avoid mistakes do invisible decreases instead of regular decreases for a cleaner look maintain a consistent gauge throughout to ensure an even look use a stitch marker to ensure you start and finish in the correct place count your stitches regularly to ensure your project stays on the right track instructions in parentheses are intended to be repeated example single_crochet increase x6 means to do a single_crochet then an increase 6 times please feel free to send me a message if you need extra guidance 2 abbreviations decrease - decrease chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase materials yarn - bernat blanket yarn in colors black race car red and school bus yellow crochet hook - 6 00mm hook safety eyes - 16mm glitter eyes stuffing stitch markers sewing needle scissors please note - this pattern will work with most yarns just be sure to adjust your hook and safety eye sizes accordingly 3 head & body please note if you wish to make your snake in a solid color or different pattern disregard the directions indicating when to change colors if you want to make your snake longer the length of the body consists of row of single crochet so simply work additional row of single crochets for additional length note that if you add row this will alter the patterning of your snake if following along with the color scheme in this pattern starting with color black for the head row 1 start with a magic_ring of 6sc 6 row 2 increase x6 12 what the color pattern row 3-4 single_crochet around for 2 row 12 will look like and what the row 5 4sc 4inc 4sc 16 suggested color-change row 6 4sc increase single_crochet increase 2sc increase single_crochet increase 4sc 20 method looks like row 7 single_crochet around 20 change to color yellow row 8-9 single_crochet around for 2 row 20 change to color black row 10 decrease x10 10 4 head & body continued pause here to add the eyes between row 4 and 5 with 4 unused stitches between them to ensure your eyes are centered on the head the 4 increases from row 5 should be the stitches between the eyes row 11-12 single_crochet around for 2 row 10 add stuffing to the head and then stuff as you go along from here on out chage to color red row 13 4sc increase x2 12 row 14-19 single_crochet around for 6 row 12 head after adding change to color black the eyes row 20-22 single_crochet around for 3 row 12 change to color yellow row 23-24 single_crochet around for 2 row 12 change to color black row 25-27 single_crochet around for 3 row 12 change to color red row 28-34 single_crochet around for 7 row 12 change to
